title: Installation issue: papyrus^mpich
body:
Papyrus builds with openmpi but fails to build with mpich.

Running:

`spack install papyrus^mpich@3.2.1 device=ch3 +hydra netmod=tcp +pci pmi=pmi +romio~slurm~verbs~wrapperrpath`

Fails like:

```
==> Executing phase: 'build'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j16'

61 errors found in build log:
     220    /spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-7.3.0/mpich-3.2.1-cvou3wu
            4yikwet64n2ddhkywl6pnsb4l/bin/mpicxx  -O2 -g -DNDEBUG   CMakeFiles/
            kv.test01_open_close.dir/test01_open_close.c.o  -o kv.test01_open_c
            lose ../../src/libpapyruskv.a

            4yikwet64n2ddhkywl6pnsb4l/bin/mpicxx  -O2 -g -DNDEBUG   CMakeFiles/
            kv.test05_fence.dir/test05_fence.c.o  -o kv.test05_fence ../../src/
            libpapyruskv.a

            kv.test12_free.dir/test12_free.c.o  -o kv.test12_free ../../src/lib

            _cache && /spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-7.3.0/cmake-3.1
```
